attributes.action: make it illegal for all footballplayers to spit on the ground while playing any sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to ban all football players from spitting while playing sport on the field this is not only disgusting but makes our younger children think that if they see any spoprts players spit on the pitch they too can do it, we the general public would be fined if we was to be caught spitting so ban all sports players from spitting no matter what the sport

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
